00011 #include <config.h>
00012 #include <stdio.h>
00013 #include <bdd/util.h>
00014 #include <bdd/st.h>

00016 #define ST_NUMCMP(x,y) ((x) != (y))
00017 #define ST_NUMHASH(x,size) (ABS((long)x)%(size))
00018 #define ST_PTRHASH(x,size) ((int)((unsigned long)(x)>>2)%size)
00019 #define EQUAL(func, x, y) \
00020     ((((func) == st_numcmp) || ((func) == st_ptrcmp)) ?\
00021       (ST_NUMCMP((x),(y)) == 0) : ((*func)((x), (y)) == 0))
00022 
00023 
00024 #define do_hash(key, table)\
00025     ((int)((table->hash == st_ptrhash) ? ST_PTRHASH((key),(table)->num_bins) :\
00026      (table->hash == st_numhash) ? ST_NUMHASH((key), (table)->num_bins) :\
00027      (*table->hash)((key), (table)->num_bins)))
00028 
00029 static int rehash ARGS((st_table *));
00030 
00031 st_table *
00032 st_init_table_with_params(
00033   ST_PFICPCP compare,
00034   ST_PFICPI hash,
00035   int size,
00036   int density,
00037   double grow_factor,
00038   int reorder_flag)
00039 {
00040     int i;
00041     st_table *newt;
00042 
00043     newt = ALLOC(st_table, 1);
00044     if (newt == NIL(st_table)) {
00045         return NIL(st_table);
00046     }
00047     newt->compare = (int (*)(const char *, const char *)) compare;
00048     newt->hash = (int (*)(char *, int)) hash;
00049     newt->num_entries = 0;
00050     newt->max_density = density;
00051     newt->grow_factor = grow_factor;
00052     newt->reorder_flag = reorder_flag;
00053     if (size <= 0) {
00054         size = 1;
00055     }
00056     newt->num_bins = size;
00057     newt->bins = ALLOC(st_table_entry *, size);
00058     if (newt->bins == NIL(st_table_entry *)) {
00059         FREE(newt);
00060         return NIL(st_table);
00061     }
00062     for(i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00063         newt->bins[i] = 0;
00064     }
00065     return newt;
00066 }
00067 
00068 st_table *
00069 st_init_table(ST_PFICPCP compare, ST_PFICPI hash)
00070 {
00071     return st_init_table_with_params(compare, hash, ST_DEFAULT_INIT_TABLE_SIZE,
00072                                      ST_DEFAULT_MAX_DENSITY,
00073                                      ST_DEFAULT_GROW_FACTOR,
00074                                      ST_DEFAULT_REORDER_FLAG);
00075 }

00077 void
00078 st_free_table(st_table *table)
00079 {
00080     register st_table_entry *ptr, *next;
00081     int i;
00082 
00083     for(i = 0; i < table->num_bins ; i++) {
00084         ptr = table->bins[i];
00085         while (ptr != NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00086             next = ptr->next;
00087             FREE(ptr);
00088             ptr = next;
00089         }
00090     }
00091     FREE(table->bins);
00092     FREE(table);
00093 }
00094 
00095 #define PTR_NOT_EQUAL(table, ptr, user_key)\
00096 (ptr != NULL && !EQUAL(table->compare, user_key, (ptr)->key))
00097 
00098 #define FIND_ENTRY(table, hash_val, key, ptr, last) \
00099     (last) = &(table)->bins[hash_val];\
00100     (ptr) = *(last);\
00101     while (PTR_NOT_EQUAL((table), (ptr), (key))) {\
00102         (last) = &(ptr)->next; (ptr) = *(last);\
00103     }\
00104     if ((ptr) != NULL && (table)->reorder_flag) {\
00105         *(last) = (ptr)->next;\
00106         (ptr)->next = (table)->bins[hash_val];\
00107         (table)->bins[hash_val] = (ptr);\
00108     }

00110 int
00111 st_lookup(st_table *table, char *key, char **value)
00112 {
00113     int hash_val;
00114     register st_table_entry *ptr, **last;
00115 
00116     hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00117 
00118     FIND_ENTRY(table, hash_val, key, ptr, last);
00119     
00120     if (ptr == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00121         return 0;
00122     } else {
00123         if (value != NIL(char *)) {
00124             *value = ptr->record; 
00125         }
00126         return 1;
00127     }
00128 }

00130 int
00131 st_lookup_int(st_table *table, char *key, int *value)
00132 {
00133     int hash_val;
00134     register st_table_entry *ptr, **last;
00135 
00136     hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00137 
00138     FIND_ENTRY(table, hash_val, key, ptr, last);
00139     
00140     if (ptr == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00141         return 0;
00142     } else {
00143         if (value != NIL(int)) {
00144             *value = (int) (util_ptrint) ptr->record;
00145         }
00146         return 1;
00147     }
00148 }
00149 
00150 /* This macro does not check if memory allocation fails. Use at you own risk */
00151 #define ADD_DIRECT(table, key, value, hash_val, newt)\
00152 {\
00153     if (table->num_entries/table->num_bins >= table->max_density) {\
00154         rehash(table);\
00155         hash_val = do_hash(key,table);\
00156     }\
00157     \
00158     newt = ALLOC(st_table_entry, 1);\
00159     \
00160     newt->key = key;\
00161     newt->record = value;\
00162     newt->next = table->bins[hash_val];\
00163     table->bins[hash_val] = newt;\
00164     table->num_entries++;\
00165 }

00167 int
00168 st_insert(st_table *table, char *key, char *value)
00169 {
00170     int hash_val;
00171     st_table_entry *newt;
00172     register st_table_entry *ptr, **last;
00173 
00174     hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00175 
00176     FIND_ENTRY(table, hash_val, key, ptr, last);
00177 
00178     if (ptr == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00179         if (table->num_entries/table->num_bins >= table->max_density) {
00180             if (rehash(table) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00181                 return ST_OUT_OF_MEM;
00182             }
00183             hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00184         }
00185         newt = ALLOC(st_table_entry, 1);
00186         if (newt == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00187             return ST_OUT_OF_MEM;
00188         }
00189         newt->key = key;
00190         newt->record = value;
00191         newt->next = table->bins[hash_val];
00192         table->bins[hash_val] = newt;
00193         table->num_entries++;
00194         return 0;
00195     } else {
00196         ptr->record = value;
00197         return 1;
00198     }
00199 }

00201 int
00202 st_add_direct(st_table *table, char *key, char *value)
00203 {
00204     int hash_val;
00205     st_table_entry *newt;
00206     
00207     hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00208     if (table->num_entries / table->num_bins >= table->max_density) {
00209         if (rehash(table) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00210             return ST_OUT_OF_MEM;
00211         }
00212     }
00213     hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00214     newt = ALLOC(st_table_entry, 1);
00215     if (newt == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00216         return ST_OUT_OF_MEM;
00217     }
00218     newt->key = key;
00219     newt->record = value;
00220     newt->next = table->bins[hash_val];
00221     table->bins[hash_val] = newt;
00222     table->num_entries++;
00223     return 1;
00224 }

00226 int
00227 st_find_or_add(st_table *table, char *key, char ***slot)
00228 {
00229     int hash_val;
00230     st_table_entry *newt, *ptr, **last;
00231 
00232     hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00233 
00234     FIND_ENTRY(table, hash_val, key, ptr, last);
00235 
00236     if (ptr == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00237         if (table->num_entries / table->num_bins >= table->max_density) {
00238             if (rehash(table) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00239                 return ST_OUT_OF_MEM;
00240             }
00241             hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00242         }
00243         newt = ALLOC(st_table_entry, 1);
00244         if (newt == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00245             return ST_OUT_OF_MEM;
00246         }
00247         newt->key = key;
00248         newt->record = (char *) 0;
00249         newt->next = table->bins[hash_val];
00250         table->bins[hash_val] = newt;
00251         table->num_entries++;
00252         if (slot != NIL(char **)) *slot = &newt->record;
00253         return 0;
00254     } else {
00255         if (slot != NIL(char **)) *slot = &ptr->record;
00256         return 1;
00257     }
00258 }

00279 
00280 static int
00281 rehash(st_table *table)
00282 {
00283     register st_table_entry *ptr, *next, **old_bins;
00284     int             i, old_num_bins, hash_val, old_num_entries;
00285 
00286     /* save old values */
00287     old_bins = table->bins;
00288     old_num_bins = table->num_bins;
00289     old_num_entries = table->num_entries;
00290 
00291     /* rehash */
00292     table->num_bins = (int) (table->grow_factor * old_num_bins);
00293     if (table->num_bins % 2 == 0) {
00294         table->num_bins += 1;
00295     }
00296     table->num_entries = 0;
00297     table->bins = ALLOC(st_table_entry *, table->num_bins);
00298     if (table->bins == NIL(st_table_entry *)) {
00299         table->bins = old_bins;
00300         table->num_bins = old_num_bins;
00301         table->num_entries = old_num_entries;
00302         return ST_OUT_OF_MEM;
00303     }
00304     /* initialize */
00305     for (i = 0; i < table->num_bins; i++) {
00306         table->bins[i] = 0;
00307     }
00308 
00309     /* copy data over */
00310     for (i = 0; i < old_num_bins; i++) {
00311         ptr = old_bins[i];
00312         while (ptr != NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00313             next = ptr->next;
00314             hash_val = do_hash(ptr->key, table);
00315             ptr->next = table->bins[hash_val];
00316             table->bins[hash_val] = ptr;
00317             table->num_entries++;
00318             ptr = next;
00319         }
00320     }
00321     FREE(old_bins);
00322 
00323     return 1;
00324 }
00325 
00326 st_table *
00327 st_copy(st_table *old_table)
00328 {
00329     st_table *new_table;
00330     st_table_entry *ptr, *newptr, *next, *newt;
00331     int i, j, num_bins = old_table->num_bins;
00332 
00333     new_table = ALLOC(st_table, 1);
00334     if (new_table == NIL(st_table)) {
00335         return NIL(st_table);
00336     }
00337     
00338     *new_table = *old_table;
00339     new_table->bins = ALLOC(st_table_entry *, num_bins);
00340     if (new_table->bins == NIL(st_table_entry *)) {
00341         FREE(new_table);
00342         return NIL(st_table);
00343     }
00344     for(i = 0; i < num_bins ; i++) {
00345         new_table->bins[i] = NIL(st_table_entry);
00346         ptr = old_table->bins[i];
00347         while (ptr != NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00348             newt = ALLOC(st_table_entry, 1);
00349             if (newt == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00350                 for (j = 0; j <= i; j++) {
00351                     newptr = new_table->bins[j];
00352                     while (newptr != NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00353                         next = newptr->next;
00354                         FREE(newptr);
00355                         newptr = next;
00356                     }
00357                 }
00358                 FREE(new_table->bins);
00359                 FREE(new_table);
00360                 return NIL(st_table);
00361             }
00362             *newt = *ptr;
00363             newt->next = new_table->bins[i];
00364             new_table->bins[i] = newt;
00365             ptr = ptr->next;
00366         }
00367     }
00368     return new_table;
00369 }
00370 
00371 int
00372 st_delete(st_table *table, char **keyp, char **value)
00373 {
00374     int hash_val;
00375     char *key = *keyp;
00376     register st_table_entry *ptr, **last;
00377 
00378     hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00379 
00380     FIND_ENTRY(table, hash_val, key, ptr ,last);
00381     
00382     if (ptr == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00383         return 0;
00384     }
00385 
00386     *last = ptr->next;
00387     if (value != NIL(char *)) *value = ptr->record;
00388     *keyp = ptr->key;
00389     FREE(ptr);
00390     table->num_entries--;
00391     return 1;
00392 }

00394 int
00395 st_delete_int(st_table *table, int *keyp, char **value)
00396 {
00397     int hash_val;
00398     char *key = (char *) (util_ptrint) *keyp;
00399     register st_table_entry *ptr, **last;
00400 
00401     hash_val = do_hash(key, table);
00402 
00403     FIND_ENTRY(table, hash_val, key, ptr ,last);
00404 
00405     if (ptr == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00406         return 0;
00407     }
00408 
00409     *last = ptr->next;
00410     if (value != NIL(char *)) *value = ptr->record;
00411     *keyp = (int) (util_ptrint) ptr->key;
00412     FREE(ptr);
00413     table->num_entries--;
00414     return 1;
00415 }

00417 int
00418 st_foreach(st_table *table, ST_PFSR func, char *arg)
00419 {
00420     st_table_entry *ptr, **last;
00421     enum st_retval retval;
00422     int i;
00423 
00424     for(i = 0; i < table->num_bins; i++) {
00425         last = &table->bins[i]; ptr = *last;
00426         while (ptr != NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00427             retval = (*func)(ptr->key, ptr->record, arg);
00428             switch (retval) {
00429             case ST_CONTINUE:
00430                 last = &ptr->next; ptr = *last;
00431                 break;
00432             case ST_STOP:
00433                 return 0;
00434             case ST_DELETE:
00435                 *last = ptr->next;
00436                 table->num_entries--;   /* cstevens@ic */
00437                 FREE(ptr);
00438                 ptr = *last;
00439             }
00440         }
00441     }
00442     return 1;
00443 }

00445 int
00446 st_strhash(char *string, int modulus)
00447 {
00448     register int val = 0;
00449     register int c;
00450     
00451     while ((c = *string++) != '\0') {
00452         val = val*997 + c;
00453     }
00454 
00455     return ((val < 0) ? -val : val)%modulus;
00456 }

00482 st_generator *
00483 st_init_gen(st_table *table)
00484 {
00485     st_generator *gen;
00486 
00487     gen = ALLOC(st_generator, 1);
00488     if (gen == NIL(st_generator)) {
00489         return NIL(st_generator);
00490     }
00491     gen->table = table;
00492     gen->entry = NIL(st_table_entry);
00493     gen->index = 0;
00494     return gen;
00495 }

00497 
00498 int 
00499 st_gen(st_generator *gen, char **key_p, char **value_p)
00500 {
00501     register int i;
00502 
00503     if (gen->entry == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00504         /* try to find next entry */
00505         for(i = gen->index; i < gen->table->num_bins; i++) {
00506             if (gen->table->bins[i] != NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00507                 gen->index = i+1;
00508                 gen->entry = gen->table->bins[i];
00509                 break;
00510             }
00511         }
00512         if (gen->entry == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00513             return 0;           /* that's all folks ! */
00514         }
00515     }
00516     *key_p = gen->entry->key;
00517     if (value_p != 0) {
00518         *value_p = gen->entry->record;
00519     }
00520     gen->entry = gen->entry->next;
00521     return 1;
00522 }
00523 
00524 
00525 int 
00526 st_gen_int(st_generator *gen, char **key_p, long *value_p)
00527 {
00528     register int i;
00529 
00530     if (gen->entry == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00531         /* try to find next entry */
00532         for(i = gen->index; i < gen->table->num_bins; i++) {
00533             if (gen->table->bins[i] != NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00534                 gen->index = i+1;
00535                 gen->entry = gen->table->bins[i];
00536                 break;
00537             }
00538         }
00539         if (gen->entry == NIL(st_table_entry)) {
00540             return 0;           /* that's all folks ! */
00541         }
00542     }
00543     *key_p = gen->entry->key;
00544     if (value_p != NIL(long)) {
00545         *value_p = (long) gen->entry->record;
00546     }
00547     gen->entry = gen->entry->next;
00548     return 1;
00549 }
